this app is terrible. it took 2 hours to download and i just wanted to support our amazing president. 😹😹 then when i opened it my whole screen turned orange and a picture of donald trump naked popped up. i thought it couldn’t get any worse, but then i looked around and a bunch of trump 2020 signs were in my room. i then realized this app has ruined my life. i tried to delete it, and it wouldn’t. delete. i ended up breaking my phone and i’m typing on my laptop. do not get this app. ❤️😭😾

This app is very inappropriate please DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT.
